Iâ€™m a software engineer based in Hong Kong. Growing up, I always had a knack for figuring out how things work. Playing a video game by following the intended path was never that interesting to me; instead, I loved messing with the mechanics, searching for exploits and shortcuts. The satisfaction of putting together something that breaks the systemâ€”something not even the developer had thought ofâ€”is what first sparked my passion for problem-solving.

I chose to apply this passion in the field of finance because when technology meets finance, it becomes infrastructure that empowers millions of people around the world.
